pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, February 14, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Mississauga, Ontario

Private meetings

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the funeral of Hazel McCallion, the former Mayor of Mississauga, and deliver remarks.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage

National Capital Region, Canada

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.
